## PowerFactors type

Factorisation represented as powers (keys are factors and values are powers)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PowerFactors = Record<string, bigint>;
```

## Example

{ "2": 2n, "3", 1n } // represents 2^2 \* 3^1 = 12
